name: iOS Development Best Practices
body:
# UI  
## Views  
### UIButton[[Class Reference](http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/#DOCUMENTATION/UIKit/Reference/UIButton_Class/UIButton/UIButton.html)]  
* Positions of title and image  
  Edge insets is the official answer[[ref](http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/DOCUMENTATION/UIKit/Reference/UIButton_Class/UIButton/UIButton.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40006815-CH3-SW31)]. But it will be troublesome if you have to deal with a lot of buttons with a specific pattern. A better solution is to subclass UIButton and override the ``layoutSubviews`` method. [[ref](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2515998/iphone-uibutton-image-position)]
